name: Chickens VS Foxes
description:
In this cruel world every one is the predator of another. But there is an exception : the poor little spot of grass ! Chicken stamping them, sheeps grazing them, you name it... And no one to stand for them. So you will play this hero, a Nature Spirit willing to make the grass prosper. So if you can’t be a predator for those chickens then you have to summon theirs! Ancient Fox Totems will offer this protection.

How to play : Simply use the arrow keys (or WASD) to solve the puzzle by moving the foxes around.
